forum.content:
12月是個讓人特別驚喜的月份，除了是耶誕節即將到來，跟著新年的即將開始，【2017關渡花海節】與【士林官邸菊展】等五花八門的活動齊聚喝采，【Mono'tel Hostel士林青年旅館】也在去年的這個時後初長嫩芽。

在即將邁向新的紀元與回顧過往的美好，【Mono'tel Hostel士林青年旅館】在此特別推出限定優惠與大家同樂歡度ㄧ歲生日。

【週年慶入住半價優惠】
對象：全世界叢林的旅人
入住期限：2017年12月至2018年元月底平日（星期天-星期四）
條件：每日限定五個名額(請盡早來電或在粉專上打卡私訊搶購)

December is most fabulous season for all with consecutive holidays. While everyone is ready for Christmas and New Year Celebration, we are also honored to share our happiness with you for Mono'tel Hostel's 1st Anniversary.

All guests who makes their accommodation to stay amid weekdays of Dec. 2017 and Jan. 2018, you're eligible to have【50% OFF DISCOUNT!!!】

We only take 5 orders per day at this exclusive premium. May luck always be in your hands. Make your booking wish now and grab your exciting holiday vacation.

In order to make your Taipei City Adventure Dream come true, please dial +886-2-7722-6622 or send message through our Facebook Page for inquiry. Our most sweet receiptionist is at your service.
